item.description: “I’ve lived a life of service,” Collins said. “When you’ve worn the cloth of our nation, you don’t flinch.”

item.description: The State Senate president tried to ease concerns about the effects of potential property-tax cuts.

item.title: Erin’s path changing a bit; islands could see impacts
item.description: Erin is still a weak tropical storm as of 5 p.m. Tuesday, as it is moving too fast to get organized.
